/usr/bin/g++-7  -g   CMakeFiles/OpenCV.dir/main.cpp.o  -o OpenCV -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/kinetic/lib /opt/ros/kinetic/lib/libopencv_highgui3.so.3.2.0 /opt/ros/kinetic/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs3.so.3.2.0 /opt/ros/kinetic/lib/libopencv_imgproc3.so.3.2.0 /opt/ros/kinetic/lib/libopencv_core3.so.3.2.0 -Wl,-rpath-link,/opt/ros/kinetic/lib
